extendedIngredients.name: potatoes
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 medium potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch pieces

recipes.title: Golden Diced Potatoes
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first five ingredients. Add 1/2 cup potatoes at a time; shake to coat.                                                                                            In two large skillets, melt butter. Add potatoes; cook and stir over medium heat for 25-30 minutes or until potatoes are tender.                                        Yield: 6 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Golden Diced Potatoes in  Quick CookingJanuary/February 2005, p35                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (1 each) equals 275 calories, 15 g fat (9 g saturated fat), 41 mg cholesterol, 411 mg sodium, 31 g carbohydrate, 2 g fiber, 4 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first five ingredients.
Add 1/2 cup potatoes at a time; shake to coat.
In two large skillets, melt butter.
Add potatoes; cook and stir over medium heat for 25-30 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
